titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry - Royal Crown Cola - 1947-12-06 - Part 2

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Part 2 of excerpts from a Royal Crown Cola sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment (9:00-9:30 pm) from December 6, 1947. Featuring Ott Devine (announcer), Louie Buck (host), and performers Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys, Cowboy Copas, Curly Fox, Texas Ruby, Bradley Kincaid, Pap's Jug Band, Johnnie & Jack and their Tennessee Mountain Boys, and Tommy Jackson. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
